mapper.select: select NVL(AVG(sale_price),0) from sales where album_no = #{albumNo} and sale_is_sold = 'f'

select A.ALBUM_TITLE as "ALBUM.title" , A.ARTIST_NAME as "ALBUM.artistName" , S.SALE_IS_OPENED as isOpened , S.SALE_PRICE as price , S.SALE_PHOTO_PATH as photoPath , A.ALBUM_NO as "ALBUM.no" , U.ACCOUNT_NUMBER as "USER.accountNumber" , U.USER_NAME as "USER.name" from sales S, albums A, users U where S.SALE_NO = #{no} and S.ALBUM_NO = A.ALBUM_NO and S.USER_NO = U.USER_NO
